alert.note: Alert for Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Etowah County through 645 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hokes Bluff, moving north at 15 mph. Another strong thunderstorm was located by Doppler radar near Southside, moving north at 15 mph as well. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Rainbow City, Boaz, Attalla, Hokes Bluff, Glencoe, Sardis City, Steele, Reece City, Tabor Road, Aurora, Ballplay, Gadsden Mall, Noccalula Falls, Neely Henry Lake, Southside, Gadsden Steam Plant, Mountainboro, Rockledge and Cobb City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
